      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameWindowControllerImpl.move(MovementDirection direction) 
      void GameWindowController.move(MovementDirection direction)
      It is called when the player triggers the movement event and it updates the model subsequently basing upon the game logics (the movement can result in a change or not).
